title: City of Los Angeles agrees to provide thousands of beds in homelessness crisis lawsuit settlement - CNN
content:
1. City of Los Angeles agrees to provide thousands of beds in homelessness crisis lawsuit settlement  CNN
  2. Los Angeles plans to shelter more homeless to end federal lawsuit  FOX 11 Los Angeles
  3. LA Homeless Crisis: City Agrees to House 60% of Homeless to Settle Lawsuit  Bloomberg
  4. L.A. will shelter more homeless people to end major lawsuit  Los Angeles Times
  5. LA announces historic settlement to address homelessness, pledges to support unhoused community  ABC7
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The city of Los Angeles has agreed to provide thousands of permanent beds for members of its unsheltered population, ending one part of a years-long battle with the LA Alliance For Human Rights over the homelessness crisis.
